catalog_script_client.name: Compare start and end date

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_e11bb806975721105515fef3a253af70
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Car Parking Reservation">e2e13f79971321105515fef3a253af04</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:72e177b9971321105515fef3a253af1c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Compare start and end date</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
    if(newValue != '') {
	var ga = new GlideAjax('checkEndDate');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'chkEndAfterStart');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_start_date', g_form.getValue("start_date"));
	ga.addParam('sysparm_end_date', newValue);
    ga.getXML(chkDate);
	}

    function chkDate(response) {
	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
    if (answer == 'false') {
         g_form.clearValue('end_date');
         g_form.addErrorMessage('end_date should be after start_date');
         return;
    }
	else {
	g_form.clearMessages();
	var ga2 = new GlideAjax('calculateDuration');
	ga2.addParam('sysparm_name', 'calDuration');
	ga2.addParam('sysparm_start_date', g_form.getValue("start_date"));
	ga2.addParam('sysparm_end_date', newValue);
	ga2.getXML(chkDur);
	}
}
	function chkDur(response) {
	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
    g_form.setValue('duration',answer);
	return;
	}
}


]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-09 10:55:25</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e11bb806975721105515fef3a253af70</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Compare start and end date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CarParkingReservation" source="x_1067756_carparki">d6eaa7b1971321105515fef3a253afb5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CarParkingReservation">d6eaa7b1971321105515fef3a253afb5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e11bb806975721105515fef3a253af70</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-09 10:58:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
